ygData.subject: new member
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail, all. I play Moorgard, a lev 12 Freeport monk on the Povar server. I don t have a lot of time to play these days, as I ve just switched jobs and am
ygData.messageBody:
Hail, all. I play Moorgard, a lev 12 Freeport monk on the Povar server. I
don't have a lot of time to play these days, as I've just switched jobs and
am getting used to a new routine. As such, level 12 is taking me forever to
get through. I hang out in N Ro and East/West Comm a lot.

I look forward to learning tips from you more experienced monks out there.
Right now my main goals are gaining levels and trying to finish a set of
mesh armor. Anything else I should be shooting for?

I would appreciate any tips you guys have on good boots and where to get them.

Anyone else think it's a real shame that mesh armor looks just like leather
when worn? If mesh had a grey/silver or black kind of look to it, I think
monks would have a much more unique appearance.

___________________________________
Steve Danuser
danu@...
